comments:
I created a fresh install of Eclipse 3.1 final with VE 1.1 and created a JApplet
to play with.  If I click the close box for Eclipse while the visual editor is
open, I get a message box warning and the following NullPointerException in the
.log file.

Re-opening Eclipse with that workspace generates another log entry (as does
closing it again with the Visual editor open).  If there is no visual editor
window open when Eclipse closes, then I don't seem to get any errors during
close or during Eclipse startup.

.log file contents follow:
